document_data.name: ''Scourge of Tiamat''
document_data.mainbody: A '''''scourge of Tiamat''''' was, much like a ''[[scourge of fangs]]'', a [[scourge]] with [[snake]]s in place of normal cords.
document_data.Description: The snakes that made up the scourge's cords were all [[viper]]s, a size smaller than the wielder a copy was designed for.
document_data.Powers: A ''scourge of Tiamat'' was functionally fairly similarly to a ''scourge of fangs.'' One notable difference was that its vipers could spit out [[Corrosive (weapon quality)|corrosive]] venom from up to {{SI|30|ft|long=yes}}, affecting a target with both [[poison]] and [[acid]].
document_data.History: These weapons dated back to the height of the [[sarrukh]] empire of [[Okoth]]. Most copies of these weapons that existed by [[1373 DR]] were ones recovered from that empire's scattered ruins.

Notable Owners.Groups: These weapons were typically favored in [[Unthalass]] by the [[Dark Scaled Ones]], high-[[priest]]s of [[Tiamat]].
